alert.note: Alert for Grundy (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued March 26 at 3:54PM CDT until March 26 at 4:15PM CDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 PM CDT FOR NORTH CENTRAL GRUNDY COUNTY... At 353 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Newark, or 8 miles north of Morris, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Morris and Minooka. This includes... Grundy County Speedway and Fairgrounds. Including the following interstate... I-80 between mile markers 109 and 120. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
